Title: Israel Freed from Egypt

Verses.1:
When Israel came out of Egypt, [*]
	Jacob's children from a foreign people,
Verses.2:
Judah became God's sanctuary, [*]
	and Israel became his dominion.
Verses.3:
The sea flees at their sight, [*]
	the Jordan turns back to its source.
Verses.4:
The mountains leap like rams, [*]
	and the hills like lambs.
Verses.5:
Why was it, sea, that you fled, [*]
	Jordan, that you returned to your source,
Verses.6:
the mountains, that you leaped like rams, [*]
	and the hills like lambs?
Verses.7:
Tremble, earth, before the Lord, [*]
	before the God of Jacob.
Verses.8:
Who turned the rock into pools of water, [*]
	and made waters spring forth from flint.

Changes: 2021-04-19 - Paul Prins: Cleaned up verse 8. It was feeling very stiff and mechanical. Couldn't stop thinking about it.
2021-04-11 - Paul Prins: First translation of psalm 114 based on Greek, Latin, and some Hebrew.
